creator: Wooga
descriptionHtml:
Solve mind teasing mysteries in the glamorous 1920s!

Dive into June Parker's captivating quest to unveil a scandalous family secret. Escape to an era of opulence and romance as you search for hidden clues through hundreds of stunning mind-teasing puzzles!

* ARE YOU READY FOR THE JOURNEY OF A LIFETIME?*

⭐KEEN-EYED DETECTIVES WANTED – Engage your sense of observation to find all hidden clues

⭐YOUR 1ST CLASS TICKET TO THRILLS – Mystery! Danger! Romance! Where will each new chapter take you?

⭐MYSTERY WITH ADDED GLAMOUR – Relax through hundreds of dazzling hidden-object scenes and customize your very own luxurious estate island

⭐25 MILLION FANS ALREADY LOVE IT – Don't miss out on the latest hit from the makers of the mythical hidden object classic "Pearl's Peril"

⭐ ALL-NEW EPISODES – Just like your favorite TV series, look forward to a new mystery in each new chapter, and a new chapter every week

---------------------------------------------------------------

June’s Journey is free to download and play, but it also allows you to purchase virtual items with real money inside the game. You can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

You may require an Internet connection to play June’s Journey and access its social features. June’s Journey may also contain advertising.

Terms of Use: https://www.wooga.com/terms-of-service/
Privacy Policy: http://www.wooga.com/legal/privacy-policy/
Visit us at http://wooga.com
Follow us on: facebook.com/JunesJourney

creator: Wooga
descriptionHtml:
Solve mind teasing mysteries in the glamorous 1920s!

Dive into June Parker's captivating quest to unveil a scandalous family secret. Escape to an era of opulence and romance as you search for hidden clues through hundreds of stunning mind-teasing puzzles!

* ARE YOU READY FOR THE JOURNEY OF A LIFETIME?*

⭐KEEN-EYED DETECTIVES WANTED – Engage your sense of observation to find all hidden clues

⭐YOUR 1ST CLASS TICKET TO THRILLS – Mystery! Danger! Romance! Where will each new chapter take you?

⭐MYSTERY WITH ADDED GLAMOUR – Relax through hundreds of dazzling hidden-object scenes and customize your very own luxurious estate island

⭐25 MILLION FANS ALREADY LOVE IT – Don't miss out on the latest hit from the makers of the mythical hidden object classic "Pearl's Peril"

⭐ ALL-NEW EPISODES – Just like your favorite TV series, look forward to a new mystery in each new chapter, and a new chapter every week

---------------------------------------------------------------

June’s Journey is free to download and play, but it also allows you to purchase virtual items with real money inside the game. You can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

You may require an Internet connection to play June’s Journey and access its social features. June’s Journey may also contain advertising.

Terms of Use: https://www.wooga.com/terms-of-service/
Privacy Policy: http://www.wooga.com/legal/privacy-policy/
Visit us at http://wooga.com
Follow us on: facebook.com/JunesJourney

creator: Wooga
descriptionHtml:
Solve mind teasing mysteries in the glamorous 1920s!

Dive into June Parker's captivating quest to unveil a scandalous family secret. Escape to an era of opulence and romance as you search for hidden clues through hundreds of stunning mind-teasing puzzles!

* ARE YOU READY FOR THE JOURNEY OF A LIFETIME?*

⭐KEEN-EYED DETECTIVES WANTED – Engage your sense of observation to find all hidden clues

⭐YOUR 1ST CLASS TICKET TO THRILLS – Mystery! Danger! Romance! Where will each new chapter take you?

⭐MYSTERY WITH ADDED GLAMOUR – Relax through hundreds of dazzling hidden-object scenes and customize your very own luxurious estate island

⭐25 MILLION FANS ALREADY LOVE IT – Don't miss out on the latest hit from the makers of the mythical hidden object classic "Pearl's Peril"

⭐ ALL-NEW EPISODES – Just like your favorite TV series, look forward to a new mystery in each new chapter, and a new chapter every week

descriptionHtml:
Solve mind teasing mysteries in the glamorous 1920s!

Dive into June Parker's captivating quest to unveil a scandalous family secret. Escape to an era of opulence and romance as you search for hidden clues through hundreds of stunning mind-teasing puzzles!

* ARE YOU READY FOR THE JOURNEY OF A LIFETIME?*

⭐KEEN-EYED DETECTIVES WANTED – Engage your sense of observation to find all hidden clues

⭐YOUR 1ST CLASS TICKET TO THRILLS – Mystery! Danger! Romance! Where will each new chapter take you?

⭐MYSTERY WITH ADDED GLAMOUR – Relax through hundreds of dazzling hidden-object scenes and customize your very own luxurious estate island

⭐25 MILLION FANS ALREADY LOVE IT – Don't miss out on the latest hit from the makers of the mythical hidden object classic "Pearl's Peril"

⭐ ALL-NEW EPISODES – Just like your favorite TV series, look forward to a new mystery in each new chapter, and a new chapter every week

DETECTIVE LEAGUES - Join the weekly tournaments with your club to climb to the top of the leaderboard. Make it to the Sherlock Division and win amazing rewards!

creator: Wooga
descriptionHtml:
Are you ready to go on an exciting journey to find hidden objects in this adventurous detective mystery game?

Sharp-eyed detectives, take matters into your own hands! June’s Journey is the thrilling adventure you’ve been waiting for. Relax with a story of romance, intrigue, and mystery in this exciting hidden object game straight from the roaring 20s!

Dive into June Parker's captivating quest to unveil a scandalous family secret. Escape to an era of glamorous mansions, drama, and romance as you solve riddles and search for clues through hundreds of stunning mind-teasing puzzles! I spy a hidden mystery detective game you don't want to miss out on.

* ARE YOU READY FOR THE JOURNEY OF A LIFETIME?*

⭐KEEN-EYED DETECTIVES WANTED – Engage your sense of observation to find all hidden clues. Think you’d make a great spy? Take notes and find the hidden objects to crack every case.

⭐YOUR FIRST CLASS TICKET TO THRILLS – Search and find: Mystery! Danger! Romance! Where will each new chapter and every new scene take you? Will June uncover the murder mystery? Will she surrender to true love? We’re sworn to secrecy; only you can unravel this enigma.


⭐MYSTERY WITH ADDED GLAMOUR – Experience hundreds of dazzling Hidden Object Scenes that will test your problem-solving skills, exercise your memory, and help sharpen your mind.

⭐ HUNDREDS OF BEAUTIFUL SCENES – Lose yourself in June’s world. Build your visual memory as you travel to new locations. Where will this mysterious thriller take you next?

⭐ DECORATE YOUR MANOR – I spy a masterpiece! Get into decorating and gardening with the opportunity to customize, remodel, and fix your very own luxurious mansion and garden island. The way you decorate your manor matters. Upgrade and customize the gorgeous gardens around your island estate.

⭐ NEW DETECTIVE LOUNGE – Make friends and get social when you join a Detective Club. Chat, share rounds of drinks, and challenge each other in Detective Leagues. Share notes on how to best complete challenges and seek for hidden items. Can you find the difference in certain scenes quicker than your challengers?

⭐25 MILLION FANS ALREADY LOVE IT – Don't miss out on the latest hit from Wooga, the makers of the mythical hidden object classic Pearl's Peril.

⭐ ALL-NEW EPISODES – Love stories? Just like your favorite TV series, look forward to a new mystery in each new story chapter, with a new chapter every week. Cliffhangers guaranteed!

⭐ RELAX AND UNWIND – Make this seek-and-find puzzle part of your mindfulness routine. Unwind while you solve mind-teasing mysteries in opulent settings. You’ll be surprised just how much you can improve your memory skills with these brain teasers!

---------------------------------------------------------------

June’s Journey by Wooga is free to download and play, but it also allows you to purchase virtual items with real money inside the game, for instance to upgrade your mansion. You can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings. You may require an Internet connection to play June’s Journey and access its social features. June’s Journey may also contain advertising.

Terms of Use: https://www.wooga.com/terms-of-service/
Privacy Policy: http://www.wooga.com/legal/privacy-policy/
Visit us at http://wooga.com
Follow us on: facebook.com/JunesJourney

Sharp-eyed detectives, take matters into your own hands! June’s Journey is the thrilling adventure you’ve been waiting for. Relax with a story of romance, intrigue, and mystery in this exciting hidden object game straight from the roaring 20s!

Dive into June Parker's captivating quest to unveil a scandalous family secret. Escape to an era of glamorous mansions, drama, and romance as you solve riddles and search for clues through hundreds of stunning mind-teasing puzzles! I spy a hidden mystery detective game you don't want to miss out on.

* ARE YOU READY FOR THE JOURNEY OF A LIFETIME?*

⭐KEEN-EYED DETECTIVES WANTED – Engage your sense of observation to find all hidden clues. Think you’d make a great spy? Take notes and find the hidden objects to crack every case.

⭐YOUR FIRST CLASS TICKET TO THRILLS – Search and find: Mystery! Danger! Romance! Where will each new chapter and every new scene take you? Will June uncover the murder mystery? Will she surrender to true love? We’re sworn to secrecy; only you can unravel this enigma.


⭐MYSTERY WITH ADDED GLAMOUR – Experience hundreds of dazzling Hidden Object Scenes that will test your problem-solving skills, exercise your memory, and help sharpen your mind.

⭐ HUNDREDS OF BEAUTIFUL SCENES – Lose yourself in June’s world. Build your visual memory as you travel to new locations. Where will this mysterious thriller take you next?

⭐ DECORATE YOUR MANOR – I spy a masterpiece! Get into decorating and gardening with the opportunity to customize, remodel, and fix your very own luxurious mansion and garden island. The way you decorate your manor matters. Upgrade and customize the gorgeous gardens around your island estate.

⭐ NEW DETECTIVE LOUNGE – Make friends and get social when you join a Detective Club. Chat, share rounds of drinks, and challenge each other in Detective Leagues. Share notes on how to best complete challenges and seek for hidden items. Can you find the difference in certain scenes quicker than your challengers?

⭐25 MILLION FANS ALREADY LOVE IT – Don't miss out on the latest hit from Wooga, the makers of the mythical hidden object classic Pearl's Peril.

⭐ ALL-NEW EPISODES – Love stories? Just like your favorite TV series, look forward to a new mystery in each new story chapter, with a new chapter every week. Cliffhangers guaranteed!

⭐ RELAX AND UNWIND – Make this seek-and-find puzzle part of your mindfulness routine. Unwind while you solve mind-teasing mysteries in opulent settings. You’ll be surprised just how much you can improve your memory skills with these brain teasers!

---------------------------------------------------------------

June’s Journey by Wooga is free to download and play, but it also allows you to purchase virtual items with real money inside the game, for instance to upgrade your mansion. You can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings. You may require an Internet connection to play June’s Journey and access its social features. June’s Journey may also contain advertising.

Terms of Use: https://www.wooga.com/terms-of-service/
Privacy Policy: http://www.wooga.com/legal/privacy-policy/
Visit us at http://wooga.com
Follow us on: facebook.com/JunesJourney

Now is the perfect time to join a club and have a chance to earn exclusive rewards!

creator: Wooga
descriptionHtml:
Are you ready to go on an exciting journey to find hidden objects in this adventurous detective mystery game?

Sharp-eyed detectives, take matters into your own hands! June’s Journey is the thrilling adventure you’ve been waiting for. Relax with a story of romance, intrigue, and mystery in this exciting hidden object game straight from the roaring 20s!

Dive into June Parker's captivating quest to unveil a scandalous family secret. Escape to an era of glamorous mansions, drama, and romance as you solve riddles and search for clues through hundreds of stunning mind-teasing puzzles! I spy a hidden mystery detective game you don't want to miss out on.

* ARE YOU READY FOR THE SCAVENGER HUNT OF A LIFETIME?*

⭐KEEN-EYED DETECTIVES WANTED – Engage your sense of observation to find all hidden clues. Think you’d make a great spy? Take notes and find the hidden objects to crack every case.

⭐YOUR FIRST CLASS TICKET TO THRILLS – Search and find: Mystery! Danger! Romance! Where will each new chapter and every new scene take you? Will June uncover the murder mystery? Will she surrender to true love? We’re sworn to secrecy; only you can unravel this enigma.


⭐MYSTERY WITH ADDED GLAMOUR – Experience hundreds of dazzling Hidden Object Scenes that will test your problem-solving skills, exercise your memory, and help sharpen your mind.

⭐ HUNDREDS OF BEAUTIFUL SCENES – Lose yourself in June’s world. Build your visual memory as you travel to new locations. Where will this mysterious thriller take you next?

⭐ DECORATE YOUR MANOR – I spy a masterpiece! Get into decorating and gardening with the opportunity to customize, remodel, and fix your very own luxurious mansion and garden island. The way you decorate your manor matters. Upgrade and customize the gorgeous gardens around your island estate.

⭐ NEW DETECTIVE LOUNGE – Make friends and get social when you join a Detective Club. Chat, share rounds of drinks, and challenge each other in Detective Leagues. Share notes on how to best complete challenges and seek for hidden items. Can you find the difference in certain scenes quicker than your challengers?

⭐25 MILLION FANS ALREADY LOVE IT – Don't miss out on the latest hit from Wooga, the makers of the mythical hidden object classic Pearl's Peril.

⭐ ALL-NEW EPISODES – Love stories? Just like your favorite TV series, look forward to a new mystery in each new story chapter, with a new chapter every week. Cliffhangers guaranteed!

⭐ RELAX AND UNWIND – Make this seek-and-find puzzle part of your mindfulness routine. Unwind while you solve mind-teasing mysteries in opulent settings. You’ll be surprised just how much you can improve your memory skills with these brain teasers!

Additional features:
- Weekly chapter releases
- Club competitions & daily challenges
- Beautiful new monthly seasonal decoration sets
- Visit your friends' islands and gift them decorative Bushes for extra rewards
- Customize your profile and show off to your friends
- Join the Detective Lounge to play with and against your friends for rewards
- Experience exciting new game modes: Spot the Difference and Time Rush
- Join the Celebration and get fantastic rewards
- Our hunky island resident Jack needs your help with his deliveries! It's up to you to decide which destination will be his next

---------------------------------------------------------------

June’s Journey by Wooga is free to download and play, but it also allows you to purchase virtual items with real money inside the game, for instance to upgrade your mansion. You can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings. You may require an Internet connection to play June’s Journey and access its social features. June’s Journey may also contain advertising.

Terms of Use: https://www.wooga.com/terms-of-service/
Privacy Policy: http://www.wooga.com/legal/privacy-policy/
Visit us at http://wooga.com
Follow us on: facebook.com/JunesJourney

creator: Wooga
descriptionHtml:
Are you ready to go on an exciting journey to find hidden objects in this adventurous detective mystery game?

Sharp-eyed detectives, take matters into your own hands! June’s Journey is the thrilling adventure you’ve been waiting for. Relax with a story of romance, intrigue, and mystery in this exciting hidden object game straight from the roaring 20s!

Dive into June Parker's captivating quest to unveil a scandalous family secret. Escape to an era of glamorous mansions, drama, and romance as you solve riddles and search for clues through hundreds of stunning mind-teasing puzzles! I spy a hidden mystery detective game you don't want to miss out on.

* ARE YOU READY FOR THE SCAVENGER HUNT OF A LIFETIME?*

⭐KEEN-EYED DETECTIVES WANTED – Engage your sense of observation to find all hidden clues. Think you’d make a great spy? Take notes and find the hidden objects to crack every case.

⭐YOUR FIRST CLASS TICKET TO THRILLS – Search and find: Mystery! Danger! Romance! Where will each new chapter and every new scene take you? Will June uncover the murder mystery? Will she surrender to true love? We’re sworn to secrecy; only you can unravel this enigma.


⭐MYSTERY WITH ADDED GLAMOUR – Experience hundreds of dazzling Hidden Object Scenes that will test your problem-solving skills, exercise your memory, and help sharpen your mind.

⭐ HUNDREDS OF BEAUTIFUL SCENES – Lose yourself in June’s world. Build your visual memory as you travel to new locations. Where will this mysterious thriller take you next?

⭐ DECORATE YOUR MANOR – I spy a masterpiece! Get into decorating and gardening with the opportunity to customize, remodel, and fix your very own luxurious mansion and garden island. The way you decorate your manor matters. Upgrade and customize the gorgeous gardens around your island estate.

⭐ NEW DETECTIVE LOUNGE – Make friends and get social when you join a Detective Club. Chat, share rounds of drinks, and challenge each other in Detective Leagues. Share notes on how to best complete challenges and seek for hidden items. Can you find the difference in certain scenes quicker than your challengers?

⭐25 MILLION FANS ALREADY LOVE IT – Don't miss out on the latest hit from Wooga, the makers of the mythical hidden object classic Pearl's Peril.

⭐ ALL-NEW EPISODES – Love stories? Just like your favorite TV series, look forward to a new mystery in each new story chapter, with a new chapter every week. Cliffhangers guaranteed!

⭐ RELAX AND UNWIND – Make this seek-and-find puzzle part of your mindfulness routine. Unwind while you solve mind-teasing mysteries in opulent settings. You’ll be surprised just how much you can improve your memory skills with these brain teasers!

Additional features:
- Weekly chapter releases
- Club competitions & daily challenges
- Beautiful new monthly seasonal decoration sets
- Visit your friends' islands and gift them decorative Bushes for extra rewards
- Customize your profile and show off to your friends
- Join the Detective Lounge to play with and against your friends for rewards
- Experience exciting new game modes: Spot the Difference and Time Rush
- Join the Celebration and get fantastic rewards
- Our hunky island resident Jack needs your help with his deliveries! It's up to you to decide which destination will be his next

---------------------------------------------------------------

June’s Journey by Wooga is free to download and play, but it also allows you to purchase virtual items with real money inside the game, for instance to upgrade your mansion. You can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings. You may require an Internet connection to play June’s Journey and access its social features. June’s Journey may also contain advertising.

Terms of Use: https://www.wooga.com/terms-of-service/
Privacy Policy: http://www.wooga.com/legal/privacy-policy/
Visit us at http://wooga.com
Follow us on: facebook.com/JunesJourney

creator: Wooga
descriptionHtml:
Are you ready to go on an exciting journey to find hidden objects in this adventurous detective mystery game?

Sharp-eyed detectives, take matters into your own hands! June’s Journey is the thrilling adventure you’ve been waiting for. Relax with a story of romance, intrigue, and mystery in this exciting hidden object game straight from the roaring 20s!

Dive into June Parker's captivating quest to unveil a scandalous family secret. Escape to an era of glamorous mansions, drama, and romance as you solve riddles and search for clues through hundreds of stunning mind-teasing puzzles! I spy a hidden mystery detective game you don't want to miss out on.

* ARE YOU READY FOR THE SCAVENGER HUNT OF A LIFETIME?*

⭐KEEN-EYED DETECTIVES WANTED – Engage your sense of observation to find all hidden clues. Think you’d make a great spy? Take notes and find the hidden objects to crack every case.

⭐YOUR FIRST CLASS TICKET TO THRILLS – Search and find: Mystery! Danger! Romance! Where will each new chapter and every new scene take you? Will June uncover the murder mystery? Will she surrender to true love? We’re sworn to secrecy; only you can unravel this enigma.


⭐MYSTERY WITH ADDED GLAMOUR – Experience hundreds of dazzling Hidden Object Scenes that will test your problem-solving skills, exercise your memory, and help sharpen your mind.

⭐ HUNDREDS OF BEAUTIFUL SCENES – Lose yourself in June’s world. Build your visual memory as you travel to new locations. Where will this mysterious thriller take you next?

⭐ DECORATE YOUR MANOR – I spy a masterpiece! Get into decorating and gardening with the opportunity to customize, remodel, and fix your very own luxurious mansion and garden island. The way you decorate your manor matters. Upgrade and customize the gorgeous gardens around your island estate.

⭐ NEW DETECTIVE LOUNGE – Make friends and get social when you join a Detective Club. Chat, share rounds of drinks, and challenge each other in Detective Leagues. Share notes on how to best complete challenges and seek for hidden items. Can you find the difference in certain scenes quicker than your challengers?

⭐25 MILLION FANS ALREADY LOVE IT – Don't miss out on the latest hit from Wooga, the makers of the mythical hidden object classic Pearl's Peril.

⭐ ALL-NEW EPISODES – Love stories? Just like your favorite TV series, look forward to a new mystery in each new story chapter, with a new chapter every week. Cliffhangers guaranteed!

⭐ RELAX AND UNWIND – Make this seek-and-find puzzle part of your mindfulness routine. Unwind while you solve mind-teasing mysteries in opulent settings. You’ll be surprised just how much you can improve your memory skills with these brain teasers!

Additional features:
- Weekly chapter releases
- Club competitions & daily challenges
- Beautiful new monthly seasonal decoration sets
- Visit your friends' islands and gift them decorative Bushes for extra rewards
- Customize your profile and show off to your friends
- Join the Detective Lounge to play with and against your friends for rewards
- Experience exciting new game modes: Spot the Difference and Time Rush
- Join the Celebration and get fantastic rewards
- Our hunky island resident Jack needs your help with his deliveries! It's up to you to decide which destination will be his next

---------------------------------------------------------------

June’s Journey by Wooga is free to download and play, but it also allows you to purchase virtual items with real money inside the game, for instance to upgrade your mansion. You can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings. You may require an Internet connection to play June’s Journey and access its social features. June’s Journey may also contain advertising.

Terms of Use: https://www.wooga.com/terms-of-service/
Privacy Policy: http://www.wooga.com/legal/privacy-policy/
Visit us at http://wooga.com
Follow us on: facebook.com/JunesJourney

creator: Wooga
descriptionHtml:
Are you ready to go on an exciting journey to find hidden objects in this adventurous detective mystery game?

Sharp-eyed detectives, take matters into your own hands! June’s Journey is the thrilling adventure you’ve been waiting for. Relax with a story of romance, intrigue, and mystery in this exciting hidden object game straight from the roaring 20s!

Dive into June Parker's captivating quest to unveil a scandalous family secret. Escape to an era of glamorous mansions, drama, and romance as you solve riddles and search for clues through hundreds of stunning mind-teasing puzzles! I spy a hidden mystery detective game you don't want to miss out on.

* ARE YOU READY FOR THE SCAVENGER HUNT OF A LIFETIME?*

⭐KEEN-EYED DETECTIVES WANTED – Engage your sense of observation to find all hidden clues. Think you’d make a great spy? Take notes and find the hidden objects to crack every case.

⭐YOUR FIRST CLASS TICKET TO THRILLS – Search and find: Mystery! Danger! Romance! Where will each new chapter and every new scene take you? Will June uncover the murder mystery? Will she surrender to true love? We’re sworn to secrecy; only you can unravel this enigma.


⭐MYSTERY WITH ADDED GLAMOUR – Experience hundreds of dazzling Hidden Object Scenes that will test your problem-solving skills, exercise your memory, and help sharpen your mind.

⭐ HUNDREDS OF BEAUTIFUL SCENES – Lose yourself in June’s world. Build your visual memory as you travel to new locations. Where will this mysterious thriller take you next?

⭐ DECORATE YOUR MANOR – I spy a masterpiece! Get into decorating and gardening with the opportunity to customize, remodel, and fix your very own luxurious mansion and garden island. The way you decorate your manor matters. Upgrade and customize the gorgeous gardens around your island estate.

⭐ NEW DETECTIVE LOUNGE – Make friends and get social when you join a Detective Club. Chat, share rounds of drinks, and challenge each other in Detective Leagues. Share notes on how to best complete challenges and seek for hidden items. Can you find the difference in certain scenes quicker than your challengers?

⭐25 MILLION FANS ALREADY LOVE IT – Don't miss out on the latest hit from Wooga, the makers of the mythical hidden object classic Pearl's Peril.

⭐ ALL-NEW EPISODES – Love stories? Just like your favorite TV series, look forward to a new mystery in each new story chapter, with a new chapter every week. Cliffhangers guaranteed!

⭐ RELAX AND UNWIND – Make this seek-and-find puzzle part of your mindfulness routine. Unwind while you solve mind-teasing mysteries in opulent settings. You’ll be surprised just how much you can improve your memory skills with these brain teasers!

Additional features:
- Weekly chapter releases
- Club competitions & daily challenges
- Beautiful new monthly seasonal decoration sets
- Visit your friends' islands and gift them decorative Bushes for extra rewards
- Customize your profile and show off to your friends
- Join the Detective Lounge to play with and against your friends for rewards
- Experience exciting new game modes: Spot the Difference and Time Rush
- Join the Celebration and get fantastic rewards
- Our hunky island resident Jack needs your help with his deliveries! It's up to you to decide which destination will be his next

---------------------------------------------------------------

June’s Journey by Wooga is free to download and play, but it also allows you to purchase virtual items with real money inside the game, for instance to upgrade your mansion. You can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings. You may require an Internet connection to play June’s Journey and access its social features. June’s Journey may also contain advertising.

Terms of Use: https://www.wooga.com/terms-of-service/
Privacy Policy: http://www.wooga.com/legal/privacy-policy/
Visit us at http://wooga.com
Follow us on: facebook.com/JunesJourney

creator: Wooga
descriptionHtml:
Are you ready to go on an exciting journey to find hidden objects in this adventurous detective mystery game?

Sharp-eyed detectives, take matters into your own hands! June’s Journey is the thrilling adventure you’ve been waiting for. Relax with a story of romance, intrigue, and mystery in this exciting hidden object game straight from the roaring 20s!

Dive into June Parker's captivating quest to unveil a scandalous family secret. Escape to an era of glamorous mansions, drama, and romance as you solve riddles and search for clues through hundreds of stunning mind-teasing puzzles! I spy a hidden mystery detective game you don't want to miss out on.

* ARE YOU READY FOR THE SCAVENGER HUNT OF A LIFETIME?*

⭐KEEN-EYED DETECTIVES WANTED – Engage your sense of observation to find all hidden clues. Think you’d make a great spy? Take notes and find the hidden objects to crack every case.

⭐YOUR FIRST CLASS TICKET TO THRILLS – Search and find: Mystery! Danger! Romance! Where will each new chapter and every new scene take you? Will June uncover the murder mystery? Will she surrender to true love? We’re sworn to secrecy; only you can unravel this enigma.


⭐MYSTERY WITH ADDED GLAMOUR – Experience hundreds of dazzling Hidden Object Scenes that will test your problem-solving skills, exercise your memory, and help sharpen your mind.

⭐ HUNDREDS OF BEAUTIFUL SCENES – Lose yourself in June’s world. Build your visual memory as you travel to new locations. Where will this mysterious thriller take you next?

⭐ DECORATE YOUR MANOR – I spy a masterpiece! Get into decorating and gardening with the opportunity to customize, remodel, and fix your very own luxurious mansion and garden island. The way you decorate your manor matters. Upgrade and customize the gorgeous gardens around your island estate.

⭐ NEW DETECTIVE LOUNGE – Make friends and get social when you join a Detective Club. Chat, share rounds of drinks, and challenge each other in Detective Leagues. Share notes on how to best complete challenges and seek for hidden items. Can you find the difference in certain scenes quicker than your challengers?

⭐25 MILLION FANS ALREADY LOVE IT – Don't miss out on the latest hit from Wooga, the makers of the mythical hidden object classic Pearl's Peril.

⭐ ALL-NEW EPISODES – Love stories? Just like your favorite TV series, look forward to a new mystery in each new story chapter, with a new chapter every week. Cliffhangers guaranteed!

⭐ RELAX AND UNWIND – Make this seek-and-find puzzle part of your mindfulness routine. Unwind while you solve mind-teasing mysteries in opulent settings. You’ll be surprised just how much you can improve your memory skills with these brain teasers!

Additional features:
- Weekly chapter releases
- Club competitions & daily challenges
- Beautiful new monthly seasonal decoration sets
- Visit your friends' islands and gift them decorative Bushes for extra rewards
- Customize your profile and show off to your friends
- Join the Detective Lounge to play with and against your friends for rewards
- Experience exciting new game modes: Spot the Difference and Time Rush
- Join the Celebration and get fantastic rewards
- Our hunky island resident Jack needs your help with his deliveries! It's up to you to decide which destination will be his next

---------------------------------------------------------------

June’s Journey by Wooga is free to download and play, but it also allows you to purchase virtual items with real money inside the game, for instance to upgrade your mansion. You can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings. You may require an Internet connection to play June’s Journey and access its social features. June’s Journey may also contain advertising.

Terms of Use: https://www.wooga.com/terms-of-service/
Privacy Policy: http://www.wooga.com/legal/privacy-policy/
Visit us at http://wooga.com
Follow us on: facebook.com/JunesJourney

creator: Wooga
descriptionHtml:
Are you ready to go on an exciting journey to find hidden objects in this adventurous detective mystery game?

Sharp-eyed detectives, take matters into your own hands! June’s Journey is the thrilling adventure you’ve been waiting for. Relax with a story of romance, intrigue, and mystery in this exciting hidden object game straight from the roaring 20s!

Dive into June Parker's captivating quest to unveil a scandalous family secret. Escape to an era of glamorous mansions, drama, and romance as you solve riddles and search for clues through hundreds of stunning mind-teasing puzzles! I spy a hidden mystery detective game you don't want to miss out on.

* ARE YOU READY FOR THE SCAVENGER HUNT OF A LIFETIME?*

⭐KEEN-EYED DETECTIVES WANTED – Engage your sense of observation to find all hidden clues. Think you’d make a great spy? Take notes and find the hidden objects to crack every case.

⭐YOUR FIRST CLASS TICKET TO THRILLS – Search and find: Mystery! Danger! Romance! Where will each new chapter and every new scene take you? Will June uncover the murder mystery? Will she surrender to true love? We’re sworn to secrecy; only you can unravel this enigma.


⭐MYSTERY WITH ADDED GLAMOUR – Experience hundreds of dazzling Hidden Object Scenes that will test your problem-solving skills, exercise your memory, and help sharpen your mind.

⭐ HUNDREDS OF BEAUTIFUL SCENES – Lose yourself in June’s world. Build your visual memory as you travel to new locations. Where will this mysterious thriller take you next?

⭐ DECORATE YOUR MANOR – I spy a masterpiece! Get into decorating and gardening with the opportunity to customize, remodel, and fix your very own luxurious mansion and garden island. The way you decorate your manor matters. Upgrade and customize the gorgeous gardens around your island estate.

⭐ NEW DETECTIVE LOUNGE – Make friends and get social when you join a Detective Club. Chat, share rounds of drinks, and challenge each other in Detective Leagues. Share notes on how to best complete challenges and seek for hidden items. Can you find the difference in certain scenes quicker than your challengers?

⭐25 MILLION FANS ALREADY LOVE IT – Don't miss out on the latest hit from Wooga, the makers of the mythical hidden object classic Pearl's Peril.

⭐ ALL-NEW EPISODES – Love stories? Just like your favorite TV series, look forward to a new mystery in each new story chapter, with a new chapter every week. Cliffhangers guaranteed!

⭐ RELAX AND UNWIND – Make this seek-and-find puzzle part of your mindfulness routine. Unwind while you solve mind-teasing mysteries in opulent settings. You’ll be surprised just how much you can improve your memory skills with these brain teasers!

---------------------------------------------------------------
June's Journey is intended for those 18 and older.June's Journey does not require payment to download and play, but it also allows you to purchase virtual items with real money inside the game. You can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings. June's Journey may also contain advertising. You may require an internet connection to play June's Journey and access its social features. You can also find more information about the functionality, compatibility, and interoperability of June's Journey in the above description and additional app store information.
By downloading this game, you agree to future game updates as released on your app store or social network. You may choose to update this game, but if you do not update, your game experience and functionalities may be reduced.
Terms of Use: https://www.wooga.com/terms-of-service/
Privacy Policy: http://www.wooga.com/legal/privacy-policy/
Visit us at http://wooga.com
Follow us on: facebook.com/JunesJourney

creator: Wooga
descriptionHtml:
Join June and more than 25 million global fans in this mysterious hidden object adventure game.
Put your Detective skills to the test! Investigate crime scenes and outsmart criminals before it’s too late!

Are you ready to go on an exciting journey to find hidden objects in this adventurous detective mystery game? Sharp-eyed detectives, take matters into your own hands!

June’s Journey is the thrilling adventure you’ve been waiting for. Relax with a story of romance, intrigue, and mystery in this exciting hidden object game straight from the roaring 20s!
Dive into June Parker's captivating quest to unveil a scandalous family secret. Escape to an era of glamorous mansions, drama, and romance as you solve riddles and search for clues through hundreds of stunning mind-teasing puzzles! I spy a hidden mystery detective game you don't want to miss out on.
* ARE YOU READY FOR THE SCAVENGER HUNT OF A LIFETIME?*
⭐KEEN-EYED DETECTIVES WANTED – Engage your sense of observation to find all hidden clues. Think you’d make a great spy? Take notes and find the hidden objects to crack every case.
⭐YOUR FIRST CLASS TICKET TO THRILLS – Search and find: Mystery! Danger! Romance! Where will each new chapter and every new scene take you? Will June uncover the murder mystery? Will she surrender to true love? We’re sworn to secrecy; only you can unravel this enigma.
⭐MYSTERY WITH ADDED GLAMOUR – Experience hundreds of dazzling Hidden Object Scenes that will test your problem-solving skills, exercise your memory, and help sharpen your mind.
⭐ HUNDREDS OF BEAUTIFUL SCENES – Lose yourself in June’s world. Build your visual memory as you travel to new locations. Where will this mysterious thriller take you next?
⭐ DECORATE YOUR MANOR – I spy a masterpiece! Get into decorating and gardening with the opportunity to customize, remodel, and fix your very own luxurious mansion and garden island. The way you decorate your manor matters. Upgrade and customize the gorgeous gardens around your island estate.
⭐ NEW DETECTIVE LOUNGE – Make friends and get social when you join a Detective Club. Chat, share rounds of drinks, and challenge each other in Detective Leagues. Share notes on how to best complete challenges and seek for hidden items. Can you find the difference in certain scenes quicker than your challengers?
⭐25 MILLION FANS ALREADY LOVE IT – Don't miss out on the latest hit from Wooga, the makers of the mythical hidden object classic Pearl's Peril.
⭐ ALL-NEW EPISODES – Love stories? Just like your favorite TV series, look forward to a new mystery in each new story chapter, with a new chapter every week. Cliffhangers guaranteed!
⭐ RELAX AND UNWIND – Make this seek-and-find puzzle part of your mindfulness routine. Unwind while you solve mind-teasing mysteries in opulent settings. You’ll be surprised just how much you can improve your memory skills with these brain teasers!

---------------------------------------------------------------
June's Journey is intended for those 18 and older.June's Journey does not require payment to download and play, but it also allows you to purchase virtual items with real money inside the game. You can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings. June's Journey may also contain advertising. You may require an internet connection to play June's Journey and access its social features. You can also find more information about the functionality, compatibility, and interoperability of June's Journey in the above description and additional app store information. By downloading this game, you agree to future game updates as released on your app store or social network. You may choose to update this game, but if you do not update, your game experience and functionalities may be reduced. Terms of Use: https://www.wooga.com/terms-of-service/ Privacy Policy: http://www.wooga.com/legal/privacy-policy/ Visit us at http://wooga.com Follow us on: facebook.com/JunesJourney

creator: Wooga
descriptionHtml:
Join June and more than 25 million global fans in this mysterious hidden object adventure game.
Put your Detective skills to the test! Investigate crime scenes and outsmart criminals before it’s too late!

Are you ready to go on an exciting journey to find hidden objects in this adventurous detective mystery game? Sharp-eyed detectives, take matters into your own hands!

June’s Journey is the thrilling adventure you’ve been waiting for. Relax with a story of romance, intrigue, and mystery in this exciting hidden object game straight from the roaring 20s!
Dive into June Parker's captivating quest to unveil a scandalous family secret. Escape to an era of glamorous mansions, drama, and romance as you solve riddles and search for clues through hundreds of stunning mind-teasing puzzles! I spy a hidden mystery detective game you don't want to miss out on.
* ARE YOU READY FOR THE SCAVENGER HUNT OF A LIFETIME?*
⭐KEEN-EYED DETECTIVES WANTED – Engage your sense of observation to find all hidden clues. Think you’d make a great spy? Take notes and find the hidden objects to crack every case.
⭐YOUR FIRST CLASS TICKET TO THRILLS – Search and find: Mystery! Danger! Romance! Where will each new chapter and every new scene take you? Will June uncover the murder mystery? Will she surrender to true love? We’re sworn to secrecy; only you can unravel this enigma.
⭐MYSTERY WITH ADDED GLAMOUR – Experience hundreds of dazzling Hidden Object Scenes that will test your problem-solving skills, exercise your memory, and help sharpen your mind.
⭐ HUNDREDS OF BEAUTIFUL SCENES – Lose yourself in June’s world. Build your visual memory as you travel to new locations. Where will this mysterious thriller take you next?
⭐ DECORATE YOUR MANOR – I spy a masterpiece! Get into decorating and gardening with the opportunity to customize, remodel, and fix your very own luxurious mansion and garden island. The way you decorate your manor matters. Upgrade and customize the gorgeous gardens around your island estate.
⭐ NEW DETECTIVE LOUNGE – Make friends and get social when you join a Detective Club. Chat, share rounds of drinks, and challenge each other in Detective Leagues. Share notes on how to best complete challenges and seek for hidden items. Can you find the difference in certain scenes quicker than your challengers?
⭐25 MILLION FANS ALREADY LOVE IT – Don't miss out on the latest hit from Wooga, the makers of the mythical hidden object classic Pearl's Peril.
⭐ ALL-NEW EPISODES – Love stories? Just like your favorite TV series, look forward to a new mystery in each new story chapter, with a new chapter every week. Cliffhangers guaranteed!
⭐ RELAX AND UNWIND – Make this seek-and-find puzzle part of your mindfulness routine. Unwind while you solve mind-teasing mysteries in opulent settings. You’ll be surprised just how much you can improve your memory skills with these brain teasers!

---------------------------------------------------------------
June's Journey is intended for those 18 and older.June's Journey does not require payment to download and play, but it also allows you to purchase virtual items with real money inside the game. You can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings. June's Journey may also contain advertising. You may require an internet connection to play June's Journey and access its social features. You can also find more information about the functionality, compatibility, and interoperability of June's Journey in the above description and additional app store information. By downloading this game, you agree to future game updates as released on your app store or social network. You may choose to update this game, but if you do not update, your game experience and functionalities may be reduced. appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
WELCOME TO GERMANY - Inspired by the country Wooga calls home, we are excited to showcase this brand-new set with lots of adorable details.
Explore half-timbered architecture while snacking on some pretzels and trying the Parker Pilsner!

Germany is famous for its enchanting fairy tale castles, and you can have a magical wonder of your own! Collect enough points before time runs out to claim the Quaint Castle centerpiece and build your own idyllic German town.

creator: Wooga
descriptionHtml:
Join June and more than 25 million global fans in this mysterious hidden object adventure game.
Put your Detective skills to the test! Investigate crime scenes and outsmart criminals before it’s too late!

Are you ready to go on an exciting journey to find hidden objects in this adventurous detective mystery game? Sharp-eyed detectives, take matters into your own hands!

June’s Journey is the thrilling adventure you’ve been waiting for. Relax with a story of romance, intrigue, and mystery in this exciting hidden object game straight from the roaring 20s!
Dive into June Parker's captivating quest to unveil a scandalous family secret. Escape to an era of glamorous mansions, drama, and romance as you solve riddles and search for clues through hundreds of stunning mind-teasing puzzles! I spy a hidden mystery detective game you don't want to miss out on.
* ARE YOU READY FOR THE SCAVENGER HUNT OF A LIFETIME?*
⭐KEEN-EYED DETECTIVES WANTED – Engage your sense of observation to find all hidden clues. Think you’d make a great spy? Take notes and find the hidden objects to crack every case.
⭐YOUR FIRST CLASS TICKET TO THRILLS – Search and find: Mystery! Danger! Romance! Where will each new chapter and every new scene take you? Will June uncover the murder mystery? Will she surrender to true love? We’re sworn to secrecy; only you can unravel this enigma.
⭐MYSTERY WITH ADDED GLAMOUR – Experience hundreds of dazzling Hidden Object Scenes that will test your problem-solving skills, exercise your memory, and help sharpen your mind.
⭐ HUNDREDS OF BEAUTIFUL SCENES – Lose yourself in June’s world. Build your visual memory as you travel to new locations. Where will this mysterious thriller take you next?
⭐ DECORATE YOUR MANOR – I spy a masterpiece! Get into decorating and gardening with the opportunity to customize, remodel, and fix your very own luxurious mansion and garden island. The way you decorate your manor matters. Upgrade and customize the gorgeous gardens around your island estate.
⭐ NEW DETECTIVE LOUNGE – Make friends and get social when you join a Detective Club. Chat, share rounds of drinks, and challenge each other in Detective Leagues. Share notes on how to best complete challenges and seek for hidden items. Can you find the difference in certain scenes quicker than your challengers?
⭐25 MILLION FANS ALREADY LOVE IT – Don't miss out on the latest hit from Wooga, the makers of the mythical hidden object classic Pearl's Peril.
⭐ ALL-NEW EPISODES – Love stories? Just like your favorite TV series, look forward to a new mystery in each new story chapter, with a new chapter every week. Cliffhangers guaranteed!
⭐ RELAX AND UNWIND – Make this seek-and-find puzzle part of your mindfulness routine. Unwind while you solve mind-teasing mysteries in opulent settings. You’ll be surprised just how much you can improve your memory skills with these brain teasers!

---------------------------------------------------------------
June's Journey is intended for those 18 and older.June's Journey does not require payment to download and play, but it also allows you to purchase virtual items with real money inside the game. You can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings. June's Journey may also contain advertising. You may require an internet connection to play June's Journey and access its social features. You can also find more information about the functionality, compatibility, and interoperability of June's Journey in the above description and additional app store information. By downloading this game, you agree to future game updates as released on your app store or social network. You may choose to update this game, but if you do not update, your game experience and functionalities may be reduced. Terms of Use: https://www.wooga.com/terms-of-service/ Privacy Policy: http://www.wooga.com/legal/privacy-policy/ Visit us at http://wooga.com Follow us on: facebook.com/JunesJourney

creator: Wooga
descriptionHtml:
Join June and more than 25 million global fans in this mysterious hidden object adventure game.
Put your Detective skills to the test! Investigate crime scenes and outsmart criminals before it’s too late!

Are you ready to go on an exciting journey to find hidden objects in this adventurous detective mystery game? Sharp-eyed detectives, take matters into your own hands!

June’s Journey is the thrilling adventure you’ve been waiting for. Relax with a story of romance, intrigue, and mystery in this exciting hidden object game straight from the roaring 20s!
Dive into June Parker's captivating quest to unveil a scandalous family secret. Escape to an era of glamorous mansions, drama, and romance as you solve riddles and search for clues through hundreds of stunning mind-teasing puzzles! I spy a hidden mystery detective game you don't want to miss out on.
* ARE YOU READY FOR THE SCAVENGER HUNT OF A LIFETIME?*
⭐KEEN-EYED DETECTIVES WANTED – Engage your sense of observation to find all hidden clues. Think you’d make a great spy? Take notes and find the hidden objects to crack every case.
⭐YOUR FIRST CLASS TICKET TO THRILLS – Search and find: Mystery! Danger! Romance! Where will each new chapter and every new scene take you? Will June uncover the murder mystery? Will she surrender to true love? We’re sworn to secrecy; only you can unravel this enigma.
⭐MYSTERY WITH ADDED GLAMOUR – Experience hundreds of dazzling Hidden Object Scenes that will test your problem-solving skills, exercise your memory, and help sharpen your mind.
⭐ HUNDREDS OF BEAUTIFUL SCENES – Lose yourself in June’s world. Build your visual memory as you travel to new locations. Where will this mysterious thriller take you next?
⭐ DECORATE YOUR MANOR – I spy a masterpiece! Get into decorating and gardening with the opportunity to customize, remodel, and fix your very own luxurious mansion and garden island. The way you decorate your manor matters. Upgrade and customize the gorgeous gardens around your island estate.
⭐ NEW DETECTIVE LOUNGE – Make friends and get social when you join a Detective Club. Chat, share rounds of drinks, and challenge each other in Detective Leagues. Share notes on how to best complete challenges and seek for hidden items. Can you find the difference in certain scenes quicker than your challengers?
⭐25 MILLION FANS ALREADY LOVE IT – Don't miss out on the latest hit from Wooga, the makers of the mythical hidden object classic Pearl's Peril.
⭐ ALL-NEW EPISODES – Love stories? Just like your favorite TV series, look forward to a new mystery in each new story chapter, with a new chapter every week. Cliffhangers guaranteed!
⭐ RELAX AND UNWIND – Make this seek-and-find puzzle part of your mindfulness routine. Unwind while you solve mind-teasing mysteries in opulent settings. You’ll be surprised just how much you can improve your memory skills with these brain teasers!

---------------------------------------------------------------

By downloading this game, you agree to future game updates as released on your app store or social network. From the frosty peaks of the Alps to the lush, misty depths of the jungle, take a journey into June's past, where her family comes closer together.

TIME FOR LOVE - Create the romantic fantasy of your dreams with the latest decoration set, and collect enough points to receive the exclusive Grand Prize.

creator: Wooga
descriptionHtml:
Are you ready to go on an exciting journey to seek and find hidden objects in this adventurous unsolved detective mystery game?

Sharp-eyed detectives, take matters into your own hands! June’s Journey is the thrilling adventure you’ve been waiting for. Relax with a story of romance, intrigue, and mystery in this exciting hidden object game straight from the roaring 20s!

Dive into June Parker's captivating quest to unveil a scandalous hidden family secret. Escape to an era of glamorous mansions, drama, and romance as you solve riddles and search for clues through hundreds of stunning mind-teasing puzzles! I spy a hidden mystery detective game you don't want to miss out on.

* ARE YOU READY FOR THE JOURNEY OF A LIFETIME?*

⭐KEEN-EYED DETECTIVES WANTED – Engage your sense of observation to find all hidden clues in this unsolved mystery adventure detective game. Think you’d make a great spy? Take notes and find the hidden objects to crack every case.

⭐YOUR FIRST CLASS TICKET TO THRILLS – Search and find: Mystery! Danger! Romance! Where will each new chapter and every new scene take you? Will June uncover the murder mystery? Will she surrender to true love? We’re sworn to secrecy; only you can unravel this enigma.


⭐MYSTERY WITH ADDED GLAMOUR – Experience hundreds of dazzling Hidden Object Scenes that will test your problem-solving skills, exercise your memory, and help sharpen your mind.

⭐ HUNDREDS OF BEAUTIFUL SCENES – Lose yourself in June’s world. Build your visual memory as you travel to new locations. Where will this mysterious thriller take you next?

⭐ DECORATE YOUR MANOR – I spy a masterpiece! Get into decorating and gardening with the opportunity to customize, remodel, and fix your very own luxurious mansion and garden island. The way you decorate your manor matters. Upgrade and customize the gorgeous gardens as well as your mystery manor on your island estate.

⭐ NEW DETECTIVE LOUNGE – Make friends and get social when you join a Detective Club. Chat, share rounds of drinks, and challenge each other in Detective Leagues. Share notes on how to best complete challenges and seek for hidden items. Can you find the difference in certain scenes quicker than your challengers?

⭐25 MILLION FANS ALREADY LOVE IT – Don't miss out on the latest hit from Wooga, the makers of the mythical hidden object classic Pearl's Peril.

⭐ ALL-NEW EPISODES – Love stories? Just like your favorite TV series, look forward to a new mystery in each new story chapter, with a new chapter every week. Cliffhangers guaranteed!

⭐ RELAX AND UNWIND – Make this seek-and-find puzzle part of your mindfulness routine. Unwind while you solve mind-teasing mysteries in opulent settings. You’ll be surprised just how much you can improve your memory skills.
---------------------------------------------------------------
June's Journey is intended for those 18 and older.June's Journey does not require payment to download and play, but it also allows you to purchase virtual items with real money inside the game. You can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings. June's Journey may also contain advertising. You may require an internet connection to play June's Journey and access its social features. You can also find more information about the functionality, compatibility, and interoperability of June's Journey in the above description and additional app store information.
By downloading this game, you agree to future game updates as released on your app store or social network. You may choose to update this game, but if you do not update, your game experience and functionalities may be reduced.
Terms of Use: https://www.wooga.com/terms-of-service/
Privacy Policy: http://www.wooga.com/legal/privacy-policy/
Visit us at http://wooga.com
Follow us on: facebook.com/JunesJourney

Dive into June Parker's captivating quest to unveil a scandalous hidden family secret. Escape to an era of glamorous mansions, drama, and romance as you solve riddles and search for clues through hundreds of stunning mind-teasing puzzles! I spy a hidden mystery detective game you don't want to miss out on.

⭐YOUR FIRST CLASS TICKET TO THRILLS – Search and find: Mystery! Danger! Romance! Where will each new chapter and every new scene take you? Will June uncover the murder mystery? Will she surrender to true love? We’re sworn to secrecy; only you can unravel this enigma.


⭐MYSTERY WITH ADDED GLAMOUR – Experience hundreds of dazzling Hidden Object Scenes that will test your problem-solving skills, exercise your memory, and help sharpen your mind.

⭐ HUNDREDS OF BEAUTIFUL SCENES – Lose yourself in June’s world. Build your visual memory as you travel to new locations. Where will this mysterious thriller take you next?

⭐ DECORATE YOUR MANOR – I spy a masterpiece! Get into decorating and gardening with the opportunity to customize, remodel, and fix your very own luxurious mansion and garden island. The way you decorate your manor matters. Upgrade and customize the gorgeous gardens as well as your mystery manor on your island estate.

⭐ NEW DETECTIVE LOUNGE – Make friends and get social when you join a Detective Club. Chat, share rounds of drinks, and challenge each other in Detective Leagues. Share notes on how to best complete challenges and seek for hidden items. Can you find the difference in certain scenes quicker than your challengers?

⭐25 MILLION FANS ALREADY LOVE IT – Don't miss out on the latest hit from Wooga, the makers of the mythical hidden object classic Pearl's Peril.

⭐ ALL-NEW EPISODES – Love stories? Just like your favorite TV series, look forward to a new mystery in each new story chapter, with a new chapter every week. Cliffhangers guaranteed!

⭐ RELAX AND UNWIND – Make this seek-and-find puzzle part of your mindfulness routine. Unwind while you solve mind-teasing mysteries in opulent settings. You’ll be surprised just how much you can improve your memory skills.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: INTRODUCING CLUB MYSTERIES - You and your Detective Club are invited to work together to solve crimes and earn rewards. creator: Wooga
descriptionHtml:
Join June and more than 25 million global fans in this mysterious hidden object adventure game.
Put your Detective skills to the test! Investigate crime scenes and outsmart criminals before it’s too late!

Are you ready to go on an exciting journey to find hidden objects in this adventurous detective mystery game? Sharp-eyed detectives, take matters into your own hands!

June’s Journey is the thrilling adventure you’ve been waiting for. Relax with a story of romance, intrigue, and mystery in this exciting hidden object game straight from the roaring 20s!
Dive into June Parker's captivating quest to unveil a scandalous family secret. Escape to an era of glamorous mansions, drama, and romance as you solve riddles and search for clues through hundreds of stunning mind-teasing puzzles! I spy a hidden mystery detective game you don't want to miss out on.
* ARE YOU READY FOR THE SCAVENGER HUNT OF A LIFETIME?*
⭐KEEN-EYED DETECTIVES WANTED – Engage your sense of observation to find all hidden clues. Think you’d make a great spy? Take notes and find the hidden objects to crack every case.
⭐YOUR FIRST CLASS TICKET TO THRILLS – Search and find: Mystery! Danger! Romance! Where will each new chapter and every new scene take you? Will June uncover the murder mystery? Will she surrender to true love? We’re sworn to secrecy; only you can unravel this enigma.
⭐MYSTERY WITH ADDED GLAMOUR – Experience hundreds of dazzling Hidden Object Scenes that will test your problem-solving skills, exercise your memory, and help sharpen your mind.
⭐ HUNDREDS OF BEAUTIFUL SCENES – Lose yourself in June’s world. Build your visual memory as you travel to new locations. Where will this mysterious thriller take you next?
⭐ DECORATE YOUR MANOR – I spy a masterpiece! Get into decorating and gardening with the opportunity to customize, remodel, and fix your very own luxurious mansion and garden island. The way you decorate your manor matters. Upgrade and customize the gorgeous gardens around your island estate.
⭐ NEW DETECTIVE LOUNGE – Make friends and get social when you join a Detective Club. Chat, share rounds of drinks, and challenge each other in Detective Leagues. Share notes on how to best complete challenges and seek for hidden items. Can you find the difference in certain scenes quicker than your challengers?
⭐25 MILLION FANS ALREADY LOVE IT – Don't miss out on the latest hit from Wooga, the makers of the mythical hidden object classic Pearl's Peril.
⭐ ALL-NEW EPISODES – Love stories? Just like your favorite TV series, look forward to a new mystery in each new story chapter, with a new chapter every week. Cliffhangers guaranteed!
⭐ RELAX AND UNWIND – Make this seek-and-find puzzle part of your mindfulness routine. Unwind while you solve mind-teasing mysteries in opulent settings. You’ll be surprised just how much you can improve your memory skills with these brain teasers!

---------------------------------------------------------------
June's Journey is intended for those 18 and older.June's Journey does not require payment to download and play, but it also allows you to purchase virtual items with real money inside the game. You can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings. June's Journey may also contain advertising. You may require an internet connection to play June's Journey and access its social features. You can also find more information about the functionality, compatibility, and interoperability of June's Journey in the above description and additional app store information. By downloading this game, you agree to future game updates as released on your app store or social network. You may choose to update this game, but if you do not update, your game experience and functionalities may be reduced. Terms of Use: https://www.wooga.com/terms-of-service/ Privacy Policy: http://www.wooga.com/legal/privacy-policy/ Visit us at http://wooga.com Follow us on: facebook.com/JunesJourney

descriptionHtml:

Sharp-eyed detectives, take matters into your own hands! June’s Journey is the thrilling adventure you’ve been waiting for. Relax with a story of romance, intrigue, and mystery in this exciting hidden object game straight from the roaring 20s!

Dive into June Parker's captivating quest to unveil a scandalous hidden family secret. Escape to an era of glamorous mansions, drama, and romance as you solve riddles and search for clues through hundreds of stunning mind-teasing puzzles! I spy a hidden mystery detective game you don't want to miss out on.

* ARE YOU READY FOR THE JOURNEY OF A LIFETIME?*

⭐KEEN-EYED DETECTIVES WANTED – Engage your sense of observation to find all hidden clues in this unsolved mystery adventure detective game. Think you’d make a great spy? Take notes and find the hidden objects to crack every case.

⭐YOUR FIRST CLASS TICKET TO THRILLS – Search and find: Mystery! Danger! Romance! Where will each new chapter and every new scene take you? Will June uncover the murder mystery? Will she surrender to true love? We’re sworn to secrecy; only you can unravel this enigma.


⭐MYSTERY WITH ADDED GLAMOUR – Experience hundreds of dazzling Hidden Object Scenes that will test your problem-solving skills, exercise your memory, and help sharpen your mind.

⭐25 MILLION FANS ALREADY LOVE IT – Don't miss out on the latest hit from Wooga, the makers of the mythical hidden object classic Pearl's Peril.

⭐ ALL-NEW EPISODES – Love stories? Just like your favorite TV series, look forward to a new mystery in each new story chapter, with a new chapter every week. Cliffhangers guaranteed!

⭐ RELAX AND UNWIND – Make this seek-and-find puzzle part of your mindfulness routine. Unwind while you solve mind-teasing mysteries in opulent settings. You’ll be surprised just how much you can improve your memory skills.

⭐ DECORATE YOUR MANOR – I spy a masterpiece! Get into decorating and gardening with the opportunity to customize, remodel, and fix your very own luxurious mansion and garden island. The way you decorate your manor matters. Upgrade and customize the gorgeous gardens around your island estate.
⭐ NEW DETECTIVE LOUNGE – Make friends and get social when you join a Detective Club. Chat, share rounds of drinks, and challenge each other in Detective Leagues. Share notes on how to best complete challenges and seek for hidden items. Can you find the difference in certain scenes quicker than your challengers?
⭐25 MILLION FANS ALREADY LOVE IT – Don't miss out on the latest hit from Wooga, the makers of the mythical hidden object classic Pearl's Peril.
⭐ ALL-NEW EPISODES – Love stories? Just like your favorite TV series, look forward to a new mystery in each new story chapter, with a new chapter every week. Cliffhangers guaranteed!
⭐ RELAX AND UNWIND – Make this seek-and-find puzzle part of your mindfulness routine. Unwind while you solve mind-teasing mysteries in opulent settings. You’ll be surprised just how much you can improve your memory skills with these brain teasers!

---------------------------------------------------------------

creator: Wooga
descriptionHtml:
Löse als Detektiv knifflige Rätsel in den Goldenen Zwanzigern!

Enthülle zusammen mit June Parker das skandalöse Geheimnis ihrer Familie. Tauche in eine Zeit voller Glamour und Romantik ein und suche in hunderten atemberaubenden Rätseln nach versteckten Hinweisen!

*BIST DU BEREIT FÜR DIE REISE DEINES LEBENS IN DIESEM DEUTSCHEN DETEKTIVSPIEL?*

⭐SCHARFSICHTIGE DETEKTIVE GESUCHT – Nutze Deine Beobachtungsgabe, um alle versteckten Hinweise und Gegenstände zu suchen und finden. Ein Geduldspiel mit spannenden Bilderrätseln.

⭐DEIN ERSTE-KLASSE-TICKET FÜR HOCHSPANNUNG – Geheimnisvoll! Gefährlich! Romantisch! Wohin werden Dich die Kapitel wohl entführen?

⭐GLAMOURÖSES RÄTSELRATEN – Entspanne Dich bei hunderten atemberaubenden Wimmelbildern und gestalte Dein eigenes luxuriöses Inselanwesen.

⭐25 MILLIONEN FANS LIEBEN JUNE – Lass Dir den neusten Hit der Macher des sagenhaften Wimmelbildklassikers „Pearl’s Peril“ nicht entgehen. Ein aufregendes neues Krimispiel.

⭐JEDE WOCHE NEUE EPISODEN – Wie bei Deiner Lieblingsfernsehserie kannst Du Dich jede Woche auf ein aufregendes neues Kapitel mit June freuen.

Zusätzliche Funktionen:

– Eine Reihe einzigartiger Charaktere, mit denen Du spannende und aufregende Abenteuer erleben kannst
– Wunderschön gestaltete Szenen, die die glamouröse Welt der 1920er Jahre widerspiegeln
– Wöchentliche Veröffentlichung neuer Kapitel
– Club-Wettbewerbe
– Wunderschöne neue saisonale Dekorationssets jeden Monat
– Besuche die Inseln Deiner Freunde und schenke ihnen dekorative Büsche für zusätzliche Belohnungen
– Passe Dein Profil an und zeige es Deinen Freunden
– Gewinne Preise bei den täglichen „Hilfe gesucht“-Aufgaben
– Tritt dem Salon der Detektive bei, um mit und gegen Deine Freunde zu spielen und noch mehr Belohnungen zu erhalten
– Erlebe spannende neue Spielmodi: „Finde den Unterschied“ und Zeitrennen
– Nimm an den Feierlichkeits-Events teil und erhalte dabei fantastische Belohnungen
– Unser gutaussehender Inselbewohner Jack braucht Deine Hilfe bei seinen Lieferungen! Es liegt an Dir, zu entscheiden, welches Ziel er als nächstes ansteuert.
– Immer hereinspaziert! Nimm an der erstaunlichen Jahrmarkt-Tombola teil!
---------------------------------------------------------------
June’s Journey ist für Personen ab 18 Jahren bestimmt. Für das Herunterladen und Spielen von June’s Journey ist keine Zahlung erforderlich, aber innerhalb des Spiels kannst Du virtuelle Gegenstände mit echtem Geld kaufen. Du kannst die Käufe im Spiel über die Einstellungen Deines Gerätes abstellen. June’s Journey kann außerdem Werbung enthalten. Möglicherweise benötigst Du eine Internetverbindung, um June’s Journey spielen und auf die jeweiligen sozialen Funktionen zugreifen zu können. Weitere Informationen über die Funktionalität, Kompatibilität und Interoperabilität von June’s Journey findest Du in der obigen Beschreibung sowie in den zusätzlichen Informationen im App-Store.
Durch das Herunterladen dieses Spiels erklärst Du Dich mit künftigen Spielupdates einverstanden, die in Deinem App-Store oder sozialen Netzwerk veröffentlicht werden. Über eine Aktualisierung des Spiels kannst Du entscheiden, allerdings können Spielerlebnis und Funktionalität eingeschränkt sein, falls Du das Spiel nicht aktualisierst.

Datenschutzrichtlinien: https://www.wooga.com/privacy-policy/

creator: Wooga
descriptionHtml:
Join June and more than 25 million global fans in this mysterious hidden object adventure game.
Put your Detective skills to the test! Investigate crime scenes and outsmart criminals before it’s too late!

Are you ready to go on an exciting journey to find hidden objects in this adventurous detective mystery game? Sharp-eyed detectives, take matters into your own hands!

June’s Journey is the thrilling adventure you’ve been waiting for. Relax with a story of romance, intrigue, and mystery in this exciting hidden object game straight from the roaring 20s!
Dive into June Parker's captivating quest to unveil a scandalous family secret. Escape to an era of glamorous mansions, drama, and romance as you solve riddles and search for clues through hundreds of stunning mind-teasing puzzles! I spy a hidden mystery detective game you don't want to miss out on.
* ARE YOU READY FOR THE SCAVENGER HUNT OF A LIFETIME?*
⭐KEEN-EYED DETECTIVES WANTED – Engage your sense of observation to find all hidden clues. Think you’d make a great spy? Take notes and find the hidden objects to crack every case.
⭐YOUR FIRST CLASS TICKET TO THRILLS – Search and find: Mystery! Danger! Romance! Where will each new chapter and every new scene take you? Will June uncover the murder mystery? Will she surrender to true love? We’re sworn to secrecy; only you can unravel this enigma.
⭐MYSTERY WITH ADDED GLAMOUR – Experience hundreds of dazzling Hidden Object Scenes that will test your problem-solving skills, exercise your memory, and help sharpen your mind.
⭐ HUNDREDS OF BEAUTIFUL SCENES – Lose yourself in June’s world. Build your visual memory as you travel to new locations. Where will this mysterious thriller take you next?
⭐ DECORATE YOUR MANOR – I spy a masterpiece! Get into decorating and gardening with the opportunity to customize, remodel, and fix your very own luxurious mansion and garden island. The way you decorate your manor matters. Upgrade and customize the gorgeous gardens around your island estate.
⭐ NEW DETECTIVE LOUNGE – Make friends and get social when you join a Detective Club. Chat, share rounds of drinks, and challenge each other in Detective Leagues. Share notes on how to best complete challenges and seek for hidden items. Can you find the difference in certain scenes quicker than your challengers?
⭐25 MILLION FANS ALREADY LOVE IT – Don't miss out on the latest hit from Wooga, the makers of the mythical hidden object classic Pearl's Peril.
⭐ ALL-NEW EPISODES – Love stories? Just like your favorite TV series, look forward to a new mystery in each new story chapter, with a new chapter every week. Cliffhangers guaranteed!
⭐ RELAX AND UNWIND – Make this seek-and-find puzzle part of your mindfulness routine. Unwind while you solve mind-teasing mysteries in opulent settings. You’ll be surprised just how much you can improve your memory skills with these brain teasers!

---------------------------------------------------------------

You can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings. June's Journey may also contain advertising. You may require an internet connection to play June's Journey and access its social features. You can also find more information about the functionality, compatibility, and interoperability of June's Journey in the above description and additional app store information. By downloading this game, you agree to future game updates as released on your app store or social network. You may choose to update this game, but if you do not update, your game experience and functionalities may be reduced. creator: Wooga
descriptionHtml:
Join June and more than 25 million global fans in this mysterious hidden object adventure game.
Put your Detective skills to the test! Investigate crime scenes and outsmart criminals before it’s too late!

Are you ready to go on an exciting journey to find hidden objects in this adventurous detective mystery game? Sharp-eyed detectives, take matters into your own hands!

June’s Journey is the thrilling adventure you’ve been waiting for. Relax with a story of romance, intrigue, and mystery in this exciting hidden object game straight from the roaring 20s!
Dive into June Parker's captivating quest to unveil a scandalous family secret. Escape to an era of glamorous mansions, drama, and romance as you solve riddles and search for clues through hundreds of stunning mind-teasing puzzles! I spy a hidden mystery detective game you don't want to miss out on.
* ARE YOU READY FOR THE SCAVENGER HUNT OF A LIFETIME?*
⭐KEEN-EYED DETECTIVES WANTED – Engage your sense of observation to find all hidden clues. Think you’d make a great spy? Take notes and find the hidden objects to crack every case.
⭐YOUR FIRST CLASS TICKET TO THRILLS – Search and find: Mystery! Danger! Romance! Where will each new chapter and every new scene take you? Will June uncover the murder mystery? Will she surrender to true love? We’re sworn to secrecy; only you can unravel this enigma.
⭐MYSTERY WITH ADDED GLAMOUR – Experience hundreds of dazzling Hidden Object Scenes that will test your problem-solving skills, exercise your memory, and help sharpen your mind.
⭐ HUNDREDS OF BEAUTIFUL SCENES – Lose yourself in June’s world. Build your visual memory as you travel to new locations. Where will this mysterious thriller take you next?
⭐ DECORATE YOUR MANOR – I spy a masterpiece! Get into decorating and gardening with the opportunity to customize, remodel, and fix your very own luxurious mansion and garden island. The way you decorate your manor matters. Upgrade and customize the gorgeous gardens around your island estate.
⭐ NEW DETECTIVE LOUNGE – Make friends and get social when you join a Detective Club. Chat, share rounds of drinks, and challenge each other in Detective Leagues. Share notes on how to best complete challenges and seek for hidden items. Can you find the difference in certain scenes quicker than your challengers?
⭐25 MILLION FANS ALREADY LOVE IT – Don't miss out on the latest hit from Wooga, the makers of the mythical hidden object classic Pearl's Peril.
⭐ ALL-NEW EPISODES – Love stories? Just like your favorite TV series, look forward to a new mystery in each new story chapter, with a new chapter every week. Cliffhangers guaranteed!
⭐ RELAX AND UNWIND – Make this seek-and-find puzzle part of your mindfulness routine. Unwind while you solve mind-teasing mysteries in opulent settings. You’ll be surprised just how much you can improve your memory skills with these brain teasers!

---------------------------------------------------------------
June's Journey is intended for those 18 and older.June's Journey does not require payment to download and play, but it also allows you to purchase virtual items with real money inside the game. You can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings. June's Journey may also contain advertising. You may require an internet connection to play June's Journey and access its social features. You can also find more information about the functionality, compatibility, and interoperability of June's Journey in the above description and additional app store information. By downloading this game, you agree to future game updates as released on your app store or social network. You may choose to update this game, but if you do not update, your game experience and functionalities may be reduced. creator: Wooga
descriptionHtml:
Join June and more than 25 million global fans in this mysterious hidden object adventure game.
Put your Detective skills to the test! Investigate crime scenes and outsmart criminals before it’s too late!

Are you ready to go on an exciting journey to find hidden objects in this adventurous detective mystery game? Sharp-eyed detectives, take matters into your own hands!

June’s Journey is the thrilling adventure you’ve been waiting for. Relax with a story of romance, intrigue, and mystery in this exciting hidden object game straight from the roaring 20s!
Dive into June Parker's captivating quest to unveil a scandalous family secret. Escape to an era of glamorous mansions, drama, and romance as you solve riddles and search for clues through hundreds of stunning mind-teasing puzzles! I spy a hidden mystery detective game you don't want to miss out on.
* ARE YOU READY FOR THE SCAVENGER HUNT OF A LIFETIME?*
⭐KEEN-EYED DETECTIVES WANTED – Engage your sense of observation to find all hidden clues. Think you’d make a great spy? Take notes and find the hidden objects to crack every case.
⭐YOUR FIRST CLASS TICKET TO THRILLS – Search and find: Mystery! Danger! Romance! Where will each new chapter and every new scene take you? Will June uncover the murder mystery? Will she surrender to true love? We’re sworn to secrecy; only you can unravel this enigma.
⭐MYSTERY WITH ADDED GLAMOUR – Experience hundreds of dazzling Hidden Object Scenes that will test your problem-solving skills, exercise your memory, and help sharpen your mind.
⭐ HUNDREDS OF BEAUTIFUL SCENES – Lose yourself in June’s world. Build your visual memory as you travel to new locations. Where will this mysterious thriller take you next?
⭐ DECORATE YOUR MANOR – I spy a masterpiece! Get into decorating and gardening with the opportunity to customize, remodel, and fix your very own luxurious mansion and garden island. The way you decorate your manor matters. Upgrade and customize the gorgeous gardens around your island estate.
⭐ NEW DETECTIVE LOUNGE – Make friends and get social when you join a Detective Club. Chat, share rounds of drinks, and challenge each other in Detective Leagues. Share notes on how to best complete challenges and seek for hidden items. Can you find the difference in certain scenes quicker than your challengers?
⭐25 MILLION FANS ALREADY LOVE IT – Don't miss out on the latest hit from Wooga, the makers of the mythical hidden object classic Pearl's Peril.
⭐ ALL-NEW EPISODES – Love stories? Just like your favorite TV series, look forward to a new mystery in each new story chapter, with a new chapter every week. Cliffhangers guaranteed!
⭐ RELAX AND UNWIND – Make this seek-and-find puzzle part of your mindfulness routine. Unwind while you solve mind-teasing mysteries in opulent settings. You’ll be surprised just how much you can improve your memory skills with these brain teasers!

---------------------------------------------------------------
