creator: Wooga
descriptionHtml:
Löse als Detektiv knifflige Rätsel in den Goldenen Zwanzigern!

Enthülle zusammen mit June Parker das skandalöse Geheimnis ihrer Familie. Tauche in eine Zeit voller Glamour und Romantik ein und suche in hunderten atemberaubenden Rätseln nach versteckten Hinweisen!

*BIST DU BEREIT FÜR DIE REISE DEINES LEBENS IN DIESEM DEUTSCHEN DETEKTIVSPIEL?*

⭐SCHARFSICHTIGE DETEKTIVE GESUCHT – Nutze Deine Beobachtungsgabe, um alle versteckten Hinweise und Gegenstände zu suchen und finden. Ein Geduldspiel mit spannenden Bilderrätseln.

⭐DEIN ERSTE-KLASSE-TICKET FÜR HOCHSPANNUNG – Geheimnisvoll! Gefährlich! Romantisch! Wohin werden Dich die Kapitel wohl entführen?

⭐GLAMOURÖSES RÄTSELRATEN – Entspanne Dich bei hunderten atemberaubenden Wimmelbildern und gestalte Dein eigenes luxuriöses Inselanwesen.

⭐25 MILLIONEN FANS LIEBEN JUNE – Lass Dir den neusten Hit der Macher des sagenhaften Wimmelbildklassikers „Pearl’s Peril“ nicht entgehen. Ein aufregendes neues Krimispiel.

⭐JEDE WOCHE NEUE EPISODEN – Wie bei Deiner Lieblingsfernsehserie kannst Du Dich jede Woche auf ein aufregendes neues Kapitel mit June freuen.

Zusätzliche Funktionen:

– Eine Reihe einzigartiger Charaktere, mit denen Du spannende und aufregende Abenteuer erleben kannst
– Wunderschön gestaltete Szenen, die die glamouröse Welt der 1920er Jahre widerspiegeln
– Wöchentliche Veröffentlichung neuer Kapitel
– Club-Wettbewerbe
– Wunderschöne neue saisonale Dekorationssets jeden Monat
– Besuche die Inseln Deiner Freunde und schenke ihnen dekorative Büsche für zusätzliche Belohnungen
– Passe Dein Profil an und zeige es Deinen Freunden
– Gewinne Preise bei den täglichen „Hilfe gesucht“-Aufgaben
– Tritt dem Salon der Detektive bei, um mit und gegen Deine Freunde zu spielen und noch mehr Belohnungen zu erhalten
– Erlebe spannende neue Spielmodi: „Finde den Unterschied“ und Zeitrennen
– Nimm an den Feierlichkeits-Events teil und erhalte dabei fantastische Belohnungen
– Unser gutaussehender Inselbewohner Jack braucht Deine Hilfe bei seinen Lieferungen! Es liegt an Dir, zu entscheiden, welches Ziel er als nächstes ansteuert.
– Immer hereinspaziert! Nimm an der erstaunlichen Jahrmarkt-Tombola teil!
---------------------------------------------------------------
June’s Journey ist für Personen ab 18 Jahren bestimmt. Für das Herunterladen und Spielen von June’s Journey ist keine Zahlung erforderlich, aber innerhalb des Spiels kannst Du virtuelle Gegenstände mit echtem Geld kaufen. Du kannst die Käufe im Spiel über die Einstellungen Deines Gerätes abstellen. June’s Journey kann außerdem Werbung enthalten. Möglicherweise benötigst Du eine Internetverbindung, um June’s Journey spielen und auf die jeweiligen sozialen Funktionen zugreifen zu können. Weitere Informationen über die Funktionalität, Kompatibilität und Interoperabilität von June’s Journey findest Du in der obigen Beschreibung sowie in den zusätzlichen Informationen im App-Store.
Durch das Herunterladen dieses Spiels erklärst Du Dich mit künftigen Spielupdates einverstanden, die in Deinem App-Store oder sozialen Netzwerk veröffentlicht werden. Über eine Aktualisierung des Spiels kannst Du entscheiden, allerdings können Spielerlebnis und Funktionalität eingeschränkt sein, falls Du das Spiel nicht aktualisierst.

creator: Wooga
descriptionHtml:
Join June and more than 25 million global fans in this mysterious hidden object adventure game.
Put your Detective skills to the test! Investigate crime scenes and outsmart criminals before it’s too late!

Are you ready to go on an exciting journey to find hidden objects in this adventurous detective mystery game? Sharp-eyed detectives, take matters into your own hands!

June’s Journey is the thrilling adventure you’ve been waiting for. Relax with a story of romance, intrigue, and mystery in this exciting hidden object game straight from the roaring 20s!
Dive into June Parker's captivating quest to unveil a scandalous family secret. Escape to an era of glamorous mansions, drama, and romance as you solve riddles and search for clues through hundreds of stunning mind-teasing puzzles! I spy a hidden mystery detective game you don't want to miss out on.
* ARE YOU READY FOR THE SCAVENGER HUNT OF A LIFETIME?*
⭐KEEN-EYED DETECTIVES WANTED – Engage your sense of observation to find all hidden clues. Think you’d make a great spy? Take notes and find the hidden objects to crack every case.
⭐YOUR FIRST CLASS TICKET TO THRILLS – Search and find: Mystery! Danger! Romance! Where will each new chapter and every new scene take you? Will June uncover the murder mystery? Will she surrender to true love? We’re sworn to secrecy; only you can unravel this enigma.
⭐MYSTERY WITH ADDED GLAMOUR – Experience hundreds of dazzling Hidden Object Scenes that will test your problem-solving skills, exercise your memory, and help sharpen your mind.
⭐ HUNDREDS OF BEAUTIFUL SCENES – Lose yourself in June’s world. Build your visual memory as you travel to new locations. Where will this mysterious thriller take you next?
⭐ DECORATE YOUR MANOR – I spy a masterpiece! Get into decorating and gardening with the opportunity to customize, remodel, and fix your very own luxurious mansion and garden island. The way you decorate your manor matters. Upgrade and customize the gorgeous gardens around your island estate.
⭐ NEW DETECTIVE LOUNGE – Make friends and get social when you join a Detective Club. Chat, share rounds of drinks, and challenge each other in Detective Leagues. Share notes on how to best complete challenges and seek for hidden items. Can you find the difference in certain scenes quicker than your challengers?
⭐25 MILLION FANS ALREADY LOVE IT – Don't miss out on the latest hit from Wooga, the makers of the mythical hidden object classic Pearl's Peril.
⭐ ALL-NEW EPISODES – Love stories? Just like your favorite TV series, look forward to a new mystery in each new story chapter, with a new chapter every week. Cliffhangers guaranteed!
⭐ RELAX AND UNWIND – Make this seek-and-find puzzle part of your mindfulness routine. Unwind while you solve mind-teasing mysteries in opulent settings. You’ll be surprised just how much you can improve your memory skills with these brain teasers!

---------------------------------------------------------------
June's Journey is intended for those 18 and older.June's Journey does not require payment to download and play, but it also allows you to purchase virtual items with real money inside the game. You can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings. June's Journey may also contain advertising. You may require an internet connection to play June's Journey and access its social features. You can also find more information about the functionality, compatibility, and interoperability of June's Journey in the above description and additional app store information. By downloading this game, you agree to future game updates as released on your app store or social network. You may choose to update this game, but if you do not update, your game experience and functionalities may be reduced. Terms of Use: https://www.wooga.com/terms-of-service/ Privacy Policy: http://www.wooga.com/legal/privacy-policy/ Visit us at http://wooga.com Follow us on: facebook.com/JunesJourney

⭐ HUNDREDS OF BEAUTIFUL SCENES – Lose yourself in June’s world. Build your visual memory as you travel to new locations. Where will this mysterious thriller take you next?

⭐ DECORATE YOUR MANOR – I spy a masterpiece! Get into decorating and gardening with the opportunity to customize, remodel, and fix your very own luxurious mansion and garden island. The way you decorate your manor matters. Upgrade and customize the gorgeous gardens as well as your mystery manor on your island estate.

⭐ NEW DETECTIVE LOUNGE – Make friends and get social when you join a Detective Club. Chat, share rounds of drinks, and challenge each other in Detective Leagues. Share notes on how to best complete challenges and seek for hidden items. Can you find the difference in certain scenes quicker than your challengers?

⭐25 MILLION FANS ALREADY LOVE IT – Don't miss out on the latest hit from Wooga, the makers of the mythical hidden object classic Pearl's Peril.

⭐ ALL-NEW EPISODES – Love stories? Just like your favorite TV series, look forward to a new mystery in each new story chapter, with a new chapter every week. Cliffhangers guaranteed!

⭐ RELAX AND UNWIND – Make this seek-and-find puzzle part of your mindfulness routine. Unwind while you solve mind-teasing mysteries in opulent settings. You’ll be surprised just how much you can improve your memory skills with these brain teasers!

creator: Wooga
descriptionHtml:
Join June and more than 25 million global fans in this mysterious hidden object adventure game.
Put your Detective skills to the test! Investigate crime scenes and outsmart criminals before it’s too late!

Are you ready to go on an exciting journey to find hidden objects in this adventurous detective mystery game? Sharp-eyed detectives, take matters into your own hands!

June’s Journey is the thrilling adventure you’ve been waiting for. Relax with a story of romance, intrigue, and mystery in this exciting hidden object game straight from the roaring 20s!
Dive into June Parker's captivating quest to unveil a scandalous family secret. Escape to an era of glamorous mansions, drama, and romance as you solve riddles and search for clues through hundreds of stunning mind-teasing puzzles! I spy a hidden mystery detective game you don't want to miss out on.
* ARE YOU READY FOR THE SCAVENGER HUNT OF A LIFETIME?*
⭐KEEN-EYED DETECTIVES WANTED – Engage your sense of observation to find all hidden clues. Think you’d make a great spy? Take notes and find the hidden objects to crack every case.
⭐YOUR FIRST CLASS TICKET TO THRILLS – Search and find: Mystery! Danger! Romance! Where will each new chapter and every new scene take you? Will June uncover the murder mystery? Will she surrender to true love? We’re sworn to secrecy; only you can unravel this enigma.
⭐MYSTERY WITH ADDED GLAMOUR – Experience hundreds of dazzling Hidden Object Scenes that will test your problem-solving skills, exercise your memory, and help sharpen your mind.
⭐ HUNDREDS OF BEAUTIFUL SCENES – Lose yourself in June’s world. Build your visual memory as you travel to new locations. Where will this mysterious thriller take you next?
⭐ DECORATE YOUR MANOR – I spy a masterpiece! Get into decorating and gardening with the opportunity to customize, remodel, and fix your very own luxurious mansion and garden island. The way you decorate your manor matters. Upgrade and customize the gorgeous gardens around your island estate.
⭐ NEW DETECTIVE LOUNGE – Make friends and get social when you join a Detective Club. Chat, share rounds of drinks, and challenge each other in Detective Leagues. Share notes on how to best complete challenges and seek for hidden items. Can you find the difference in certain scenes quicker than your challengers?
⭐25 MILLION FANS ALREADY LOVE IT – Don't miss out on the latest hit from Wooga, the makers of the mythical hidden object classic Pearl's Peril.
⭐ ALL-NEW EPISODES – Love stories? Just like your favorite TV series, look forward to a new mystery in each new story chapter, with a new chapter every week. Cliffhangers guaranteed!
⭐ RELAX AND UNWIND – Make this seek-and-find puzzle part of your mindfulness routine. Unwind while you solve mind-teasing mysteries in opulent settings. You’ll be surprised just how much you can improve your memory skills with these brain teasers!

---------------------------------------------------------------
June's Journey is intended for those 18 and older. June's Journey does not require payment to download and play, but it allows you to purchase virtual items with real money inside the game, including random items. You can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings. June's Journey may also contain advertising. You may require an internet connection to play June's Journey and access its social features. You can also find more information about the functionality, compatibility, and interoperability of June's Journey in the above description and additional app store information.
By downloading this game, you agree to future game updates as released on your app store or social network. You may choose to update this game, but if you do not update, your game experience and functionalities may be reduced.

creator: Wooga
descriptionHtml:
Join June and more than 25 million global fans in this mysterious hidden object adventure game.
Put your Detective skills to the test! Investigate crime scenes and outsmart criminals before it’s too late!

Are you ready to go on an exciting journey to find hidden objects in this adventurous detective mystery game? Sharp-eyed detectives, take matters into your own hands!

June’s Journey is the thrilling adventure you’ve been waiting for. Relax with a story of romance, intrigue, and mystery in this exciting hidden object game straight from the roaring 20s!
Dive into June Parker's captivating quest to unveil a scandalous family secret. Escape to an era of glamorous mansions, drama, and romance as you solve riddles and search for clues through hundreds of stunning mind-teasing puzzles! I spy a hidden mystery detective game you don't want to miss out on.
* ARE YOU READY FOR THE SCAVENGER HUNT OF A LIFETIME?*
⭐KEEN-EYED DETECTIVES WANTED – Engage your sense of observation to find all hidden clues. Think you’d make a great spy? Take notes and find the hidden objects to crack every case.
⭐YOUR FIRST CLASS TICKET TO THRILLS – Search and find: Mystery! Danger! Romance! Where will each new chapter and every new scene take you? Will June uncover the murder mystery? Will she surrender to true love? We’re sworn to secrecy; only you can unravel this enigma.
⭐MYSTERY WITH ADDED GLAMOUR – Experience hundreds of dazzling Hidden Object Scenes that will test your problem-solving skills, exercise your memory, and help sharpen your mind.
⭐ HUNDREDS OF BEAUTIFUL SCENES – Lose yourself in June’s world. Build your visual memory as you travel to new locations. Where will this mysterious thriller take you next?
⭐ DECORATE YOUR MANOR – I spy a masterpiece! Get into decorating and gardening with the opportunity to customize, remodel, and fix your very own luxurious mansion and garden island. The way you decorate your manor matters. Upgrade and customize the gorgeous gardens around your island estate.
⭐ NEW DETECTIVE LOUNGE – Make friends and get social when you join a Detective Club. Chat, share rounds of drinks, and challenge each other in Detective Leagues. Share notes on how to best complete challenges and seek for hidden items. Can you find the difference in certain scenes quicker than your challengers?
⭐25 MILLION FANS ALREADY LOVE IT – Don't miss out on the latest hit from Wooga, the makers of the mythical hidden object classic Pearl's Peril.
⭐ ALL-NEW EPISODES – Love stories? Just like your favorite TV series, look forward to a new mystery in each new story chapter, with a new chapter every week. Cliffhangers guaranteed!
⭐ RELAX AND UNWIND – Make this seek-and-find puzzle part of your mindfulness routine. Unwind while you solve mind-teasing mysteries in opulent settings. You’ll be surprised just how much you can improve your memory skills with these brain teasers!

---------------------------------------------------------------
June's Journey is intended for those 18 and older. June's Journey does not require payment to download and play, but it allows you to purchase virtual items with real money inside the game, including random items. You can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings. June's Journey may also contain advertising. You may require an internet connection to play June's Journey and access its social features. You can also find more information about the functionality, compatibility, and interoperability of June's Journey in the above description and additional app store information.
By downloading this game, you agree to future game updates as released on your app store or social network. You may choose to update this game, but if you do not update, your game experience and functionalities may be reduced.

If you have not played Travels yet, you are in for an adventure!

INVITE YOUR FRIENDS - Invite your dearest to join your journey and earn amazing rewards together! Playing with friends has never been easier. Learn more by accessing the Visit a Friend pop-up on your island.

creator: Wooga
descriptionHtml:
Join June and more than 25 million global fans in this mysterious hidden object adventure game.
Put your Detective skills to the test! Investigate crime scenes and outsmart criminals before it’s too late!

Are you ready to go on an exciting journey to find hidden objects in this adventurous detective mystery game? Sharp-eyed detectives, take matters into your own hands!

June’s Journey is the thrilling adventure you’ve been waiting for. Relax with a story of romance, intrigue, and mystery in this exciting hidden object game straight from the roaring 20s!
Dive into June Parker's captivating quest to unveil a scandalous family secret. Escape to an era of glamorous mansions, drama, and romance as you solve riddles and search for clues through hundreds of stunning mind-teasing puzzles! I spy a hidden mystery detective game you don't want to miss out on.
* ARE YOU READY FOR THE SCAVENGER HUNT OF A LIFETIME?*
⭐KEEN-EYED DETECTIVES WANTED – Engage your sense of observation to find all hidden clues. Think you’d make a great spy? Take notes and find the hidden objects to crack every case.
⭐YOUR FIRST CLASS TICKET TO THRILLS – Search and find: Mystery! Danger! Romance! Where will each new chapter and every new scene take you? Will June uncover the murder mystery? Will she surrender to true love? We’re sworn to secrecy; only you can unravel this enigma.
⭐MYSTERY WITH ADDED GLAMOUR – Experience hundreds of dazzling Hidden Object Scenes that will test your problem-solving skills, exercise your memory, and help sharpen your mind.
⭐ HUNDREDS OF BEAUTIFUL SCENES – Lose yourself in June’s world. Build your visual memory as you travel to new locations. Where will this mysterious thriller take you next?
⭐ DECORATE YOUR MANOR – I spy a masterpiece! Get into decorating and gardening with the opportunity to customize, remodel, and fix your very own luxurious mansion and garden island. The way you decorate your manor matters. Upgrade and customize the gorgeous gardens around your island estate.
⭐ NEW DETECTIVE LOUNGE – Make friends and get social when you join a Detective Club. Chat, share rounds of drinks, and challenge each other in Detective Leagues. Share notes on how to best complete challenges and seek for hidden items. Can you find the difference in certain scenes quicker than your challengers?
⭐25 MILLION FANS ALREADY LOVE IT – Don't miss out on the latest hit from Wooga, the makers of the mythical hidden object classic Pearl's Peril.
⭐ ALL-NEW EPISODES – Love stories? Just like your favorite TV series, look forward to a new mystery in each new story chapter, with a new chapter every week. Cliffhangers guaranteed!
⭐ RELAX AND UNWIND – Make this seek-and-find puzzle part of your mindfulness routine. Unwind while you solve mind-teasing mysteries in opulent settings. You’ll be surprised just how much you can improve your memory skills with these brain teasers!

---------------------------------------------------------------
June's Journey is intended for those 18 and older. June's Journey does not require payment to download and play, but it allows you to purchase virtual items with real money inside the game, including random items. You can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings. June's Journey may also contain advertising. You may require an internet connection to play June's Journey and access its social features. You can also find more information about the functionality, compatibility, and interoperability of June's Journey in the above description and additional app store information.
By downloading this game, you agree to future game updates as released on your app store or social network. You may choose to update this game, but if you do not update, your game experience and functionalities may be reduced.

Terms of Use: https://www.wooga.com/terms-of-service/
Privacy Policy: http://www.wooga.com/legal/privacy-policy/
Visit us at http://wooga.com
Follow us on: facebook.com/JunesJourney

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
NEW SECRET - Martha's Mystery on January 21st!
Someone has been vandalizing Orchid Island, but June is busy with another case … so the Talbots decide to step in as detectives.
Who’s behind the destruction, and what is their motive? Can the Talbots solve the mystery before more chaos unfolds?
Play this new Secret to follow the story and earn beautiful decorations.

creator: Wooga
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to June’s Journey, the ultimate experience for fans of mystery games, search and find adventures, and elegant storytelling. Set in the glamorous 1920s, this thrilling detective tale lets you search for hidden clues, uncover secrets, and explore stunning scenes full of suspense. Join June Parker on a captivating journey through family scandals, clever puzzle games, and unforgettable twists. Whether you're solving crimes or enjoying the thrill of the search, this is one of the most captivating hidden object games you’ll ever play.

SEARCH AND FIND HIDDEN OBJECTS
Sharpen your skills in hundreds of richly illustrated hidden object puzzles, where each location offers a new mystery to search through. From lavish mansions to exotic destinations, uncover missing objects, vital clues, and hidden secrets. Fans of finding hidden objects, seek and find, murder mysteries, and classic search games will love the satisfaction of spotting every detail in this polished mystery adventure game.

SOLVE PUZZLES, MASTER MYSTERIES
Get swept into a dramatic story full of intrigue, deception, and murder mystery. Follow June through twists and turns as you solve cases, collect evidence, and crack codes. With clever puzzle games, layered storytelling, and immersive world-building, this is one of the most addictive mystery games on mobile. Whether uncovering a key clue or following the trail of secrets, every chapter offers something new to explore.

DESIGN & DECORATE YOUR ESTATE
Design and upgrade your luxurious island manor as you search for the truth. Complete scenes to earn rewards, unlock new areas, and bring life to your estate. The perfect blend of home design and detective work gives this mystery game its own unique charm among other hidden object games.

RELAX & STAY SHARP
June’s Journey offers relaxing gameplay with just the right level of challenge. Solve puzzles, search for clues, and enjoy the soothing pace that makes every session rewarding. It’s the ideal choice for fans of search and find games, murder mystery games, and cosy adventure games. Whether you're uncovering hidden objects or unravelling secrets, there's always something new to discover.

JOIN DETECTIVE CLUBS
Join forces with other players in Detective Clubs and take your investigations to the next level. Compete in special spot the difference events, share strategies, and search together to top the leaderboard. Whether you're collaborating or going solo, there's always a new mystery game moment to experience.

NEW CHAPTERS WEEKLY
The search never ends! Every week brings new chapters packed with fresh hidden object scenes, compelling stories, and clever twists. Stay engaged in a mystery game that’s always evolving—part narrative, part puzzle game, and pure adventure.

June's Journey is intended for those 18 and older. June's Journey does not require payment to download and play, but it allows you to purchase virtual items with real money inside the game, including random items. You can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings. June's Journey may also contain advertising. You may require an internet connection to play June's Journey and access its social features. By downloading this game, you agree to future game updates as released on your app store or social network. You may choose to update this game, but if you do not update, your game experience and functionalities may be reduced.
